Welcome to QGOpt’s documentation!¶

QGOpt is an extension of TensorFlow optimizers on Riemannian manifolds that often arise in quantum mechanics (the Complex Stiefel manifold, the manifold of density matrices, the manifold of Choi matrices, etc).
